definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

sentences.english: A variety of conifers and hardwoods makes up the bulk of the vegetation .
sentences.chinese: 大部分植被由各種針葉樹類和闊葉樹類構成。

sentences.english: The existing vegetation is also referenced, by the spotted gum cladding on each of the buildings.
sentences.chinese: 通過每座建築上的斑桉包層，現有植被也被引用。

sentences.english: Isolation strips should be cleared of all inflammable vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 隔離帶上所有易燃的植被應清除。

sentences.english: The northern Duars has dense vegetation and abundant wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 北部Duars有濃密的植被和豐富的野生動植物。

sentences.english: Serai process of vegetation on the sand of Zhanggutai in Liaoning province is from moving dune.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧省章古臺沙地植被的演替過程，從流動沙丘開始。

sentences.english: The red that lines the top of the image is plant-covered land in the Markarfljót river valley.
sentences.chinese: 圖片頂部用紅色劃出的是植被覆蓋的馬卡弗特河谷。

sentences.english: The vegetation was divided into 17 associations, and the characteristics of the associations were described.
sentences.chinese: 植被可劃分爲17個羣叢，論述了各羣叢的特徵。

sentences.english: Simple vegetation type with low coverage is dominated by herb.
sentences.chinese: 植被類型簡單，以草本植物爲主，覆蓋度低。

sentences.english: The influence of pasturing on the vegetation was also analyzed and is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同時就過度放牧對植被的影響進行了論述。

sentences.english: Chinese fir is one of good tree species during establishing anthropogenic vegetations on red earth in low hills.
sentences.chinese: 杉木是低丘紅壤地區人工植被建造的優良樹種。

sentences.english: The third one will show you the aerosol optical inversion algorithm in sparse vegetation region.
sentences.chinese: 第三章介紹了稀疏植被區域氣溶膠光學厚度反演算法。

sentences.english: The occurrence of salinization are mainly due to unsuited irrigation, plant community damage and seawater intrusion.
sentences.chinese: 究其原因主要是不適當灌溉，植被破壞和海水內侵。

sentences.english: The slope debris flows may be controlled by construction of drainage systems and reforestation.
sentences.chinese: 建排水系統和發育植被可以最終控制坡面泥石流。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic scattering characteristics of ground vegetation in a half-space model are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出了地面植被電磁散射的半空間模型研究方法。

sentences.english: The moss is in close relationship with its zonal vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 此外，蘚類植物與其地帶性植被關係密切。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
